intro: Heterotis buettneriana, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that come in a variety of colors. Heterotis buettneriana prefers bright, indirect light and well-draining soil to prevent root rot.
